tab1.title1: <RichColor Color="0.62,0.36,0.04,1">✯✯✯✯✯</>   <RichColor Color="0.11,0.39,0.24,1">Welcome to E.K.O (Early Knock Off) Gaming</>   <RichColor Color="0.62,0.36,0.04,1">✯✯✯✯✯</>
tab1.text1:
<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">This server restarts every 6 hours, starting midnight! 
I am working on an alert code for this, but atm there is none! 
Keep an eye on the clock until then!</>

<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1"Rated [R] 18+</>
This Site Is Not Suitable For Children, Or The Easily Triggered!


This server is crafted for adventurers who understand that life happens. We're not online 24/7 because, just like you, we have lives to live.

Our server rates are designed to provide a non-grindy experience, making it enjoyable for everyone. However, be warned, the wild dinos are a bit feistier to keep things exciting.

We believe in a fair game, and thus, we will NEVER wipe unless it's essential due to updates or patch issues. Your progress and creations are safe with us.

Explore, survive, and enjoy your time in our unique gaming world. Embrace the unpredictability and the thrill of the game.


See you in the wild!
— The E.K.O Gaming Team

tab2.text1:
<TextStyle.LightBlue>Respectful Gameplay:</>
Sledging, foul language, and shit-stirs encouraged, all with good humour.
but...
NO nasty harassment, hate speech, or toxic behavior.

<TextStyle.LightBlue>No Foundation Spamming:</>
Avoid excessive structures that may obstruct other players' experiences.

<TextStyle.LightBlue>No Griefing:</>
Do not intentionally ruin other players' enjoyment.
Respect other tribes' bases and tames.

<TextStyle.LightBlue>One Base Per Tribe:</>
Each tribe is allowed one main base. Satellite outposts are not permitted. 
Do NOT leave sleeping bags all over the place, that's what teleporters are for!

<TextStyle.LightBlue>No Building in Rare Resource Areas:</>
Avoid constructing bases in zones with rare resources to ensure fair access for all players.

<TextStyle.LightBlue>Timers and Claiming:</>
It is the responsibility of each player to reset timers on their bases and 'unballed' tames.
Unclaimed structures and tames may be destroyed/claimed by others once timers expire.

<TextStyle.LightBlue>Safe Spawn Areas:</>
Please refrain from building extensive structures on beaches in easy spawn areas
This ensures new players can spawn safely.

<TextStyle.LightBlue>Reporting Issues:</>
Report any rule violations or issues to the admin team via Discord.


Remember, these rules are in place to foster a positive and enjoyable environment for all survivors. Violations may result in consequences, including warnings, temporary bans, or permanent bans, depending on the severity and recurrence of the offence.

Thank you for being part of our ARK community, and happy surviving!

tab4.text1:
Points every 5min
Points Awarded 50
Open Shop = F2
tab4.text2:
<TextStyle.LightBlue>Keybinds:</>
-Melee - Toggle Target Lock (The Version were you hold the spyglass Toggles with primary fire button)
-Alt+MWheel Toggle Scan
-Alt+MWheel Zoom
-Alt+Right Mouse Reset Zoom
-Alt+Num- Toggle Structure Info
-Alt+Num* Toggle Dino Owner Info
-Alt+Num/ Toggle UI Anims On/Off
-Shift+F3 Predator Vision
-Shift+F4 Night Vision
-Shift+F5 Outline Mode
-Alt+Home Opens the User Settings Menu
tab4.text4:
<TextStyle.LightBlue>Rideable Tames:</>
Dodo, Dilophosaur, Troodon, Lystrosaurus, Oviraptor, Titanoboa, Hyaenodon, Kentrosaurus, Trilobite, Piranha, Electrophorus, and Dung Beetle.
All dinos will gain a saddle slot in their inventory, and Rideable's Armor can be crafted in the player's inventory to give 25 armor to them.
Pairs well with my 'Imbue And Upgrade Station' mod!

tab5.text1:
After utilizing the 'Dino Pick Up' item in tames inventory, players can now effortlessly lift their dinos.
Simply hold <TextStyle.Yellow>'E'</> and choose 'Pick Up'.
To release a dino, simply double tap <TextStyle.Yellow>'F'</>.
tab5.text2:
To use the Finder interface, open your inventory and navigate to the new Finder tab (should be the last tab icon to the right).
The refresh button has a 3-second cooldown to prevent spam clicking.
The Dinoclass button has a 1-minute cooldown.
tab5.text3:
Adds Fire, Lightning, Poison, Ice and Tek Wyverns, Rock Drake, Phoenix, Shadowmane and Astrocetus.

<TextStyle.LightBlue>Added Resources:</> Wyvern Milk, Nameless Venom, RockDrake Saddle/Tek Saddle.

<TextStyle.LightBlue>Crafting Table:</> Improved Longneck + Improved Ammo, ChainSaw and ArrowNet (Net Projectile).

<TextStyle.LightBlue>Taming:</> Wyverns/Magmasaur/Shadowmane are tamed by Knockout

<TextStyle.LightBlue>Items required for taming are obtained from Dead Bodies:</>
Fire Wyvern = Fire Claw
Lightning Wyvern = Lightning Claw
Position Wyvern = Position Claw
Ice Wyvern = Ice Crystal
Tek Wyvern = Element Piece
Magmasaur = Ambergris
Shadowmane = ShadowSteak
tab5.text4: Encounter formidable orcs,  mischievous goblins, towering trolls, the enigmatic werewolves, and an array of other fantastical beings
